casebody.data:
Ann Treat v. Douglas Allen (4880)

Dupont, C. J., Borden and O’Connell, Js.

Submitted on briefs December 3 — decision released December 13, 1987 Edward N. Lerner filed a brief for the appellant (plaintiff). Harold C. Donegan filed a brief for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

A careful examination of the record and briefs filed in this appeal, coupled with our analysis of the claim of error raised by the plaintiff, leads to the conclusion that the plaintiff was not deprived of a fair trial.

There is no error.
